items.summary: Add production deployment documentation that explains exactly how to deploy the app to the Internet Computer mainnet, including: prerequisites (dfx), building the frontend assets, deploying canisters to the `ic` network, and where to find the resulting live URL(s).
Ensure the project has a clean production build path: frontend builds without development-only assumptions, and can be served from an IC assets canister (deep links load the SPA correctly).
Confirm backend canister deployment readiness: the Motoko canister compiles and deploys to mainnet even if it is currently minimal/empty.
